metadata.title: The Boy and the Baker by vOz
metadata.migrationNotes: V2 schema migration in progress: Beats 1-11 complete (17.2%). Beat-driven structure with cast list, machine-readable style guide, director-driven visual concept breakdown, and attribute inheritance.

cast.name: The Baker

visualProfile.clothing: Earth-tone shirt, rolled sleeves, cream flour-dusted apron, simple leather shoes
visualProfile.bodyLanguage: Deliberate, still, strong hands; speaks little but listens deeply
visualProfile.symbolism: Bread as sacrament; represents sanctuary, process, care

cast.characterArc: Largely constant — a fixed light in the boy's shifting world

cast.name: The Boy

visualProfile.clothing: Oversized dusty blue shirt, worn shoes, later flour-dusted apron
visualProfile.symbolism: Sparrow-like — small, unnoticed, capable of rising

cast.characterArc: Slouched and hollow early → stands straighter after bakery scenes → composed but worn in final scenes

cast.name: The Gang

visualProfile.build: Varied, physically imposing to the boy

cast.characterArc: Appear early, flee when confronted by authority

styleGuide.corePhilosophy: Hand-drawn warmth with narrative restraint. Emotional but grounded, metaphorical without fantasy excess.
styleGuide.culturalContext: Time of hardship and quiet resilience; baker possibly Greek-French heritage

textureAndLinework.texture: Visible hand-drawn texture or watercolor grain
textureAndLinework.depth: Layered depth using subtle outlines + color blending
textureAndLinework.consistency: Unified semi-anime, painterly aesthetic across all elements

lighting.warm: Golden light for bakery and safe spaces
lighting.cool: Cooler tones in courtroom and jail scenes
lighting.transformative: Amber or radiant glow in transformation/final moments
lighting.particles: Dust and particles catch sunlight indoors

sceneAnchors.name: Dusty Street Corner
sceneAnchors.description: Transitional village edge, signs of wear, low sun

sceneAnchors.name: Bakery Interior
sceneAnchors.description: Soft light, wooden textures, flour-dusted surfaces, aroma-rich air
sceneAnchors.location: Always on corner between main road and alley

sceneAnchors.name: Back Alley
sceneAnchors.description: Quiet, shadowed, partially hidden from street

sceneAnchors.name: Village Center
sceneAnchors.description: Loose square of buildings, background activity

sceneAnchors.name: Countryside Road
sceneAnchors.description: Winding path, fences, trees, journey energy

sceneAnchors.name: Riverbank
sceneAnchors.description: Still water, tall grass, moment of reflection

sceneAnchors.name: Courtroom
sceneAnchors.description: Village hall-style space, rustic wood and stone

sceneAnchors.name: Jail Cell
sceneAnchors.description: Sparse, cold stone, barred light, emotional weight

symbolicElements.meaning: Compassionate intelligence, gentle presence, unseen guardianship

do: Use nature as a framing device
dont: Use saturated neons or synthetic blues
Use sterile backdrops or minimalist voids

contextDocuments.summary: 1930s French village, Studio Ghibli watercolor style, warm earth tones

narrative.text: An elderly baker walking to his shop sees a boy being bullied and beaten by a gang of older children.
narrative.speaker: narrator

beatLevelDefaults.ambiance: Warm morning sun, long angled shadows

visualConcepts.description: Baker walks toward shop, morning stillness
visualConcepts.purpose: Establish the peaceful morning routine before disruption

visualConcepts.description: Baker pauses, sees violence down the street
visualConcepts.purpose: Show the moment Baker becomes aware of the bullying

visualConcepts.description: Gang surrounds and beats the boy
visualConcepts.purpose: Reveal the brutal reality of what Baker witnesses

narrative.text: He shouts and the children run off.
narrative.speaker: narrator

beatLevelDefaults.ambiance: Golden light cuts into alley shadows

visualConcepts.purpose: Show Baker's intervention causing immediate retreat

narrative.text: He goes to the boy who is bruised and shaken.
narrative.speaker: narrator

beatLevelDefaults.ambiance: Sunlight slicing through haze, sense of sudden calm

visualConcepts.purpose: Show Baker's compassionate response to the boy's injuries

narrative.text: The baker puts his arm around him and brings him into his shop.
narrative.speaker: narrator

visualConcepts.purpose: Show Baker's protective care, establishing their connection

attributeOverrides.ambiance: Threshold between street and sanctuary, soft bakery light ahead

visualConcepts.purpose: Transition from street danger to bakery safety

narrative.text: Once inside he asks the boy,
narrative.speaker: narrator

beatLevelDefaults.ambiance: Amber light from windows, flour dust catching beams

visualConcepts.purpose: Setup for dialogue, Baker seeking to understand boy's situation

beatLevelDefaults.ambiance: Warm amber light, safe but serious atmosphere

visualConcepts.purpose: Capture boy's emotional reaction to the baker's difficult question about his parents

beatLevelDefaults.ambiance: Golden light softens sadness, intimate atmosphere

visualConcepts.description: Boy prepares to respond, vulnerable and alone
visualConcepts.purpose: Focus entirely on boy's emotional state - downcast eyes, bruised face, preparing to admit he's alone

narrative.text: I have no parents. I'm all alone.
narrative.speaker: narrator

visualConcepts.description: Boy confesses he's alone, baker responds with quiet empathy
visualConcepts.purpose: Capture the emotional exchange - boy's painful admission and baker's compassionate response

narrative.text: The baker sees a lost look in the boy's eyes.
narrative.speaker: narrator

visualConcepts.description: Baker observes the depth of the boy's loss
visualConcepts.purpose: Baker perceives the boy's traumatic past in his eyes

visualConcepts.description: Symbolic montage of abandoned children in the streets

attributeOverrides.ambiance: Cooler muted tones, gray-blue light with distant warm glow

visualConcepts.purpose: Visual metaphor for what the baker sees in the boy's eyes - the broader tragedy of abandoned children

narrative.text: He understands the boy is one of many countless children who are abandoned and alone,
narrative.speaker: narrator

beatLevelDefaults.ambiance: Golden amber light returns, hopeful atmosphere

visualConcepts.description: Baker processes the broader tragedy, compassion deepens
visualConcepts.purpose: Baker's internal realization - this boy represents countless abandoned children

visualConcepts.description: Baker extends hand in offer, boy softens and begins to trust
visualConcepts.purpose: Physical gesture of help - baker's hand extended, boy's hesitant response, trust forming

narrative.text: left to live on the streets fending for themselves.
narrative.speaker: narrator

beatLevelDefaults.ambiance: Golden light persists, but weight of tragedy lingers in the air

visualConcepts.description: Boy's hesitant response to baker's extended hand, trust tentatively forming
visualConcepts.purpose: Boy responds to baker's offer - the moment connection solidifies despite the harsh reality narration describes
